  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class World
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Represents a game world.

        public Cell adjacent(Cell cell,
                     Direction direction)
        Finds the cell adjacent to a given cell, in a given direction.
        Parameters:
        cell - the given cell
        direction - the direction to move
        Returns:
        the adjacent cell when moving one step in the given direction

      • check

        public boolean check(Condition condition,
                     Colony asking,
                     Cell cell)
        Checks if a given cell satisfies the given condition, with the question asked by an ant of a particular Colony
        Parameters:
        condition - the condition to check for
        asking - the colony that is 'asking the question'
        cell - the cell to check the condition on
        Returns:
        true if the condition holds for the cell, otherwise false

        red - the red colony
        black - the black colony
